name: com.unity.muse.sprite
description: Muse Sprite Tool is a package that provides a set of tools to help create AI-generated 2D asset content from text input in Unity

_upm.changelog:
### Added

- Add option for Default Path of Muse assets in Preferences.

### Fixed

- Fixed Style Trainer split view handle can be dragged beyond the intended size.
- Fix UltraLiteDB could not be found when doing builds.
